mapper.select:
select
from mt_customer where status='1'
and customer_name like concat('%',#{c.customerName},"%")
and contact_name like concat('%',#{c.contactName},"%")
and dept_id in
#{item}

select
from mt_customer where status='1' and partId=#{partId} limit 1

from mt_customer where synchro_date is not null and status = '1'

from mt_customer where ecode = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = '1'
